name: 3 Inch Apes - for iPhone and iPod Touch
blurb: Fun, addictive jungle battles with your friends for iOS. Choose your Ape and protect your claim! Find your opponent's hammock to win!

rewards.reward: Pledge $1.00 and receive a huge, heart-felt thank you from us to you.  To show our appreciation, we will list your name as a backer on our website AND list your name in the game credits.

How cool is this?  Not only did you just pre-order the game and locked in all the rewards above, but you have also ensured that you will be one of the first individuals every to play the completed game and guaranteed yourself to have a banana up on your friends and family when you play.
Again, you get all the rewards listed above, plus we will also send you a postcard signed by us, the development team.
Want to help us beta test this awesome game?  Pledge $25 and this, along with all the rewards listed above, will be your destiny!
The ultimate currency in 3 Inch Apes is Golden Bananas.  Pledge $50 dollars and we will give you 25 golden bananas!  You can use these to buy new items in the game.

Pledge $75 and you will get a custom t-shirt so that you can tell your family and friends that you were one of the original backers who helped make this game!  Plus, as always, you also receive all the rewards listed above.

Now this is starting to really get exciting!  Pledge $150.00 and you will receive a limited edition bobblehead from the game.  What better way to show your love for 3 Inch Apes then by having your own bobblehead sitting on your desk staring back at you every day!

Custom Painting of Bo: Bo is a fun loving, upbeat ape that enjoys a good joke and never heard a pun he didn\u2019t like.  A custom painting of him would make the perfect addition to your home!  We have commissioned a local artist to create a one of a kind drawing of each of the 4 main characters in 3 Inch Apes.  There is only one of each character, hand painted with watercolors.

Custom Painting of Bosco: A 200 gram silverback bully, Bosco is a grouchy ex-jock that still lives in the glory days of his high school football career.  We have commissioned a local artist to create a one of a kind drawing of each of the 4 main characters in 3 Inch Apes.  There is only one of each character, hand painted with watercolors.

Custom Painting of Esteban:  Ever the ladies ape, who wouldn\u2019t want a one of a kind painting of Esteban hanging in their office or living room?  We have commissioned a local artist to create a one of a kind drawing of each of the 4 main characters in 3 Inch Apes.  There is only one of each character, hand painted with watercolors.

Custom Painting of Nanette: A sassy southern bell, Nanette drives all the apes bananas. So, why not make her your favorite lady ape?  We have commissioned a local artist to create a one of a kind drawing of each of the 4 main characters in 3 Inch Apes.  There is only one of each character, hand painted with watercolors.

And finally, the grand daddy of them all!  Pledge $1000 and you will get every reward listed above (except for the custom painting) AND we will build a custom ape in your likeness (or anybody else you choose) to be included in the game.
